content: Yes! Yes, that's it. I'm terrified. You know, I'd better go inside.
speaker: Fiona

content: (She smiles as she turns around to walk up the windmill's steps. She breathes a sigh of relief)
Don't feel bad, Princess. I used to be afraid of the dark, too, until -- Hey, no, wait. I'm still afraid of the dark.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek groans and Fiona chuckles)
Good night.
speaker: Fiona

content: Good night.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Fiona goes inside the windmill, gives Shrek a look, and closes the door. Donkey looks at Shrek with a new eye)
Ohh! Now I really see what's going on here.
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh, what are you talkin' about?'
speaker: Shrek

content: (Donkey trots over to Shrek as he kneels by the fire and fiddles with one of the spits)
I don't even wanna hear it. Look, I'm an animal, and I got instincts. And I know you two were diggin' on each other. I could feel it.
speaker: Donkey

content: You're crazy. I'm just bringing her back to Farquaad.
speaker: Shrek

content: Oh, come on, Shrek. Wake up and smell the pheromones. Just go on in and tell her how you feel.
speaker: Donkey

content: I--there's nothing to tell. Besides, even if I did tell her that, well, you know-- and I'm not sayin' I do, 'cause I don't -- she's a princess, and I'm...
speaker: Shrek

content: An ogre?
speaker: Donkey

content: Yeah. An ogre.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek tosses the spit aside and trudges away)
Hey, where you going?
speaker: Donkey

content: To get...more firewood.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Donkey looks suspiciously over at the large pile of firewood already piled up. Shrek sits on the hill and gazes out at Duloc until nightfall)
WINDMILL - EXTERIOR - NIGHT
(Donkey opens the door to the windmill and steps in. The abandoned windmill is filed with shadows and cobwebs. All is quiet and Fiona is nowhere to be seen)
Princess? Princess Fiona? Princess, where are you?
speaker: Donkey

content: A group of birds flocks out the top of the roof, startling Donkey. He continues on.
Princess?
speaker: Donkey

content: (A hand grips the rungs of a ladder)
It's very spooky in here. I ain't playing no games.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Fiona looks at Donkey, cloaked in shadows, from up above on a platform. She tries to sneak away, but a wood plank breaks and she falls down with a crash. She screams and lands on a sack of flour, launching a cloud of flour into the air. Donkey is frozen with fear, unable to tell who the figure is)
Aah!
speaker: Donkey

content: No, no!
speaker: Fiona

content: No, help!
speaker: Donkey

content: Shh!
speaker: Fiona

content: (An ogress emerges from the cloud of flour, approaching Donkey)
Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!
speaker: Donkey

content: No, it's okay! It's okay!
speaker: Fiona

content: What did you do with the princess?!
speaker: Donkey

content: Donkey, shh! I'm the princess.
speaker: Fiona

content: Aah!
speaker: Donkey

content: It's me, in this body.
speaker: Fiona

content: Oh, my God! You ate the princess. (to her stomach) Can you hear me?
speaker: Donkey

content: Donkey!
speaker: Fiona

content: (still aimed at her stomach) Listen, keep breathing! I'll get you out of there!
speaker: Donkey

content: No!
speaker: Fiona

content: Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!
speaker: Donkey

content: (Covering Donkey's mouth) Shh.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Muffled) Shrek!
speaker: Donkey

content: This is me.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Donkey looks into her eyes as she pets his muzzle, and he calms down)
Princess...? What happened to you? You're, uh...uh...eh...different.
speaker: Donkey

content: I'm ugly, okay?
speaker: Fiona

content: Well, yeah! Well was it something you ate? 'Cause I told Shrek those rats was a bad idea. You are what you eat, I said. Now--
speaker: Donkey

content: No! I -- I've been this way as long as I can remember.
speaker: Fiona

content: What do you mean? Look, I ain't never seen you like this before.
speaker: Donkey

content: It only happens when sun goes down.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona leans over a barrel filled with water, looking at her reflection)
"By night one way, by day another. This shall be the norm... until you find true love's first kiss... and then take love's true form."
speaker: Fiona

content: Aww, that's beautiful. I didn't know you wrote poetry.
speaker: Donkey

content: It's a spell. (sigh) When I was a little girl, a witch cast a spell on me. Every night I become this. This horrible, ugly beast!
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona smacks her reflection in the water, which splashes water onto Donkey)
I was placed in a tower to await the day my true love would rescue me. That's why I have to marry Lord Farquaad tomorrow before the sun sets and he sees me...like this.
speaker: Fiona

content: (She holds her head and begins to cry)
All right, all right. Calm down. Look, it's not that bad. You're not that ugly. Well, ok, I ain't gonna lie. You are ugly. But you only look like this at night. Shrek's ugly 24/7.
speaker: Donkey

content: But Donkey, I'm a princess, and this is not how a princess is meant to look.
speaker: Fiona

content: Princess, how 'bout if you don't marry Farquaad?
speaker: Donkey

content: I have to. Only my true love's kiss can break the spell.
speaker: Fiona

content: But, you know, um...you're kind of an ogre. And Shrek...well...you got a lot in common.
speaker: Donkey

content: Shrek?
speaker: Fiona

content: WINDMILL EXTERIOR
(Shrek is walking towards the windmill with a sunflower in his hand, talking to himself)

Princess, I-- Uh, how's it going, first of all? Good? Um, good for me too. I'm okay. I saw this flower and thought of you because it's pretty and-- well, I don't really like it but I thought you might like it 'cause you're pretty. But I like you anyway. I'd-- uh, uh...(sighs) I'm in trouble. Okay, here we go.
speaker: Shrek

content: (He walks up to the door and pauses outside when he hears Donkey and Fiona talking)

I can't just marry whoever I want. Take a good look at me, Donkey. I mean, really, who can ever love a beast so hideous and ugly? "Princess" and "ugly" don't go together. That's why I can't stay here with Shrek.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek steps back in shock, misunderstanding the conversation's meaning)
My only chance to live happily ever after is to marry my true love. Don't you see, Donkey? That's just how it has to be.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek heaves a deep sigh. He throws the flower down and walks away angrily)
WINDMILL INTERIOR
It's the only way to break the spell.
speaker: Fiona

content: Well you at least gotta tell Shrek the truth.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Donkey walks over to the door)
No! You can't breathe a word. No one must ever know.
speaker: Fiona

content: What's the point of being able to talk if you gotta keep secrets?
speaker: Donkey

content: Promise you won't tell. Promise!
speaker: Fiona

content: All right, all right. I won't tell him. But you should.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Donkey steps outside and talks to himself)
I just know before this is over, I'm gonna need a whole lot of serious therapy. Look at my eye twitching.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Fiona opens the door and watches him walk away. She looks down and spots the sunflower left by the door. She picks it up and looks around, then heads back inside and closes the door. Donkey falls asleep by the fire outside)
WINDMILL INTERIOR - MORNING
(Donkey is asleep. Fiona is still awake, plucking at petals from the sunflower)
I tell him, I tell him not. I tell him, I tell him not...
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona picks the last petal off the sunflower, smiling)
I tell him! Shrek!
speaker: Fiona

content: (She opens the door and steps outside)
Shrek! There's something I want...
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona looks around for Shrek only to see Donkey sleeping. She sees the rising sun, and as the sun crests the sky, she turns back into a human. She looks up again to see Shrek stomping towards her. She hurries over to him)
Shrek! Are you all right?
speaker: Fiona

content: (She puts her hand on his arm, but he nudges it away and walks past her)
Perfect! Never been better.
speaker: Shrek

content: I...I don't...there's something I have to tell you.
speaker: Fiona

content: You don't have to tell me anything, princess. I heard enough last night.
speaker: Shrek

content: You heard what I said?
speaker: Fiona

content: Every word.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek sits down on the steps of the windmill and faces Fiona)
I thought you'd understand.
speaker: Fiona

content: Oh, I understand. Like you said, "Who could love a hideous, ugly beast?"
speaker: Shrek

content: But I thought that wouldn't matter to you.
speaker: Fiona

content: Yeah? Well, it does.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Fiona looks at him in shock, tears welling in her eyes. Shrek looks past her and spots a group approaching)
Ah, right on time. Princess, I've brought you a little something.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek gestures towards the group and Fiona stands with her mouth wide. Lord Farquaad arrives on horseback, appearing taller than usual, along with an escort of guards. Donkey wakes up with a yawn as the guards march by)
What'd I miss? What'd I miss?
speaker: Donkey

content: (One of the guards looms over him and he begins to scurry away, muttering to himself)
Who said that? Couldn't have been the donkey.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Lord Farquaad stops his horse in front of Fiona)
Princess Fiona.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: As promised. Now hand it over.
speaker: Shrek

content: Very well, ogre. The deed to your swamp, cleared out, as agreed. Take it and go before I change my mind.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Shrek snatches the deed out of the hands of a guard and walks away. Fiona is put off by this exchange. She reverts her attention back to the long-awaited Lord Farquaad)
Forgive me, Princess, for startling you, but you startled me--for I have never seen such a radiant beauty before. I am Lord Farquaad.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: Lord Farquaad? Oh, no, no. Forgive me, my lord, for I was just saying a short...
speaker: Fiona

content: (Lord Farquaad snaps his finger and is lifted off his horse by his guards. Left behind on the horse is a large set of gauntlets and a pair of leg extenders that reached down to the stirrups, which made him look so tall on the saddle. and set down in front of her. Standing at the height of four and a half feet, he is much shorter than Fiona. Her look turns from nervousness to bemusement, and she awkwardly smiles)
...farewell.
speaker: Fiona

content: Oh, that is so sweet. You don't have to waste good manners on the ogre. It's not like it has feelings.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: No, you're right. It doesn't.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek, still standing nearby with his back turned, is hurt by the comment. Donkey watches this exchange with a curious look on his face)
Princess Fiona, beautiful, fair, flawless Fiona. I ask your hand in marriage.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Lord Farquaad gets down on one knee and takes Fiona's hand, pulling her down sharply)
Will you be the perfect bride for the perfect groom?
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Fiona makes eye contact with Shrek before he turns away. Her sad look turns to bitterness)
Lord Farquaad, I accept. Nothing would make--
speaker: Fiona

content: Excellent! I'll start the plans, for tomorrow we wed!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: No!
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek spins back around with a hopeful look on his face while Fiona tries to regain her composure)
I mean--ah, why wait? Let's get married today. Before sunset.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek glares and turns away)
Oh, anxious, are we? You're right. The sooner, the better. There's so much to do!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Lord Farquaad snaps his fingers and is lifted onto his horse by his guard. The guard offers Fiona assistance, but she looks up onto the saddle on her own)
There's the caterer, the cake, the band, the guest list. Captain, round up some guests!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Fiona, Lord Farquaad, and his guards set off towards Duloc. Fiona gives Shrek one last spiteful look)
Fare thee well, ogre.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Donkey catches up to Shrek as he his walking away)
Shrek, what are you doing? You're letting her get away!
speaker: Donkey

content: Yeah? So what?
speaker: Shrek

content: Shrek there's something about her you don't know. Look, I-- I talked to her last night... She's --
speaker: Donkey

content: Yeah I know you talked to her last night. You're great pals, aren't ya? Now, if you two are such good friends, why don't you follow her home?!
speaker: Shrek

content: But Shrek, I-- I wanna go with you.
speaker: Donkey

content: Hey I told you, didn't I? You're not coming home with me. I live alone! My swamp! Me! Nobody else! Understand? Nobody! ESPECIALLY USELESS, PATHETIC, ANNOYING, TALKING DONKEYS!
speaker: Shrek

content: But, I thought...
speaker: Donkey

content: Yeah. You know what? You thought wrong! (storms off)
speaker: Shrek

content: (sadly) Shrek.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Montage of different scenes. Shrek arrives back home. The swamp is a mess but the fairytale creatures are gone. Fiona is being fitted for her wedding dress. Shrek throws a sunflower into the fireplace. Lord Farquaad proudly tries on his crown. Fiona stares at her wedding cake, pushing down a figure of Lord Farquaad to show his actual height. She notices a suit of armor that reminds her of Shrek. Donkey stops by a river where he finds Dragon crying, both of them happy to see each other. Shrek and Fiona both try to eat dinner but start crying)
SHREK'S SWAMP
(Shrek is sitting at the dinner table when he hears a sound outside. He goes outside to investigate, and sees Donkey assembling a line of branches and small rocks)
Donkey? What are you doing?
speaker: Shrek

content: I would think, of all people, you would recognize a wall when you see one.
speaker: Donkey

content: Well, yeah. But the wall's supposed to go around my swamp, not through it.
speaker: Shrek

content: It is, around your half. See that's your half, and this is my half.
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh! Your half? Hmm.
speaker: Shrek

content: Yes, my half. I helped rescue the princess. I did half the work. I get half the booty. Now hand me that big old rock, the one that looks like your head.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek starts pulling down the wall and picks up a large branch. Donkey butts his head against it and the 2 struggle over it)
Back off!
speaker: Shrek

content: No, you back off.
speaker: Donkey

content: This is my swamp!
speaker: Shrek

content: Our swamp!
speaker: Donkey

content: Let go, Donkey!
speaker: Shrek

content: You let go!
speaker: Donkey

content: Stubborn jackass!
speaker: Shrek

content: Smelly ogre.
speaker: Donkey

content: Fine!
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek suddenly lets go of the branch, tripping Donkey over, and he walks away)
Hey, hey, come back here. I'm not through with you yet.
speaker: Donkey

content: Well, I'm through with you!
speaker: Shrek

content: (Donkey starts following him)
Uh-uh! You know, with you it's always "me, me, me!" Well, guess what! Now it's my turn! So you just shut up and pay attention!
speaker: Donkey

content: (Just as Shrek nears the door to his home, Donkey jumps in front of him. Shrek walks in another direction)
You are mean to me! You insult me and you don't appreciate anything that I do! You're always pushing me around or pushing me away.
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh, yeah? Well, if I treated you so bad, how come you came back?
speaker: Shrek

content: Because that's what friends do! They forgive each other!
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh, yeah. You're right, Donkey. I forgive you...for stabbing me in the back!
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek enters the outhouse and slams the door behind him)
Ohhhhh! You're so wrapped up in layers, onion boy, you're afraid of your own feelings.
speaker: Donkey

content: Go away!
speaker: Shrek

content: See! There you are, doing it again just like you did to Fiona. And all she ever do was like you, maybe even love you.
speaker: Donkey

content: Love me? She said I was ugly! A hideous creature! I heard the two of you talking.
speaker: Shrek

content: She wasn't talkin' about you. She was talkin' about...uh...somebody else.
speaker: Donkey

content: (After a brief silence, Shrek comes up of the outhouse)
She wasn't talking about me? Well then who was she talking about?
speaker: Shrek

content: (Donkey turns his back to Shrek)
Uh-uh, no way. I ain't saying anything. You don't wanna listen to me. Right? Right?
speaker: Donkey

content: Donkey!
speaker: Shrek

content: No!
speaker: Donkey

content: Okay, look. I'm sorry, all right?
speaker: Shrek

content: (Donkey turns his head back to raise his eyebrow, and then looks away again. Shrek sighs)
I'm sorry. I guess I am just a big, stupid...ugly ogre. Can you forgive me?
speaker: Shrek

content: Hey, that's what friends are for, right?
speaker: Donkey

content: Right. Friends?
speaker: Shrek

content: Friends.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek and Donkey shake on it)
So, um, what did Fiona say about me?
speaker: Shrek

content: What are you asking me for? Why don't you just go ask her?
speaker: Donkey

content: The wedding! We'll never make it in time.
speaker: Shrek

content: Ha-ha-ha! Never fear, for where, there's a will, there's a way and I have a way.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Donkey whistles loudly, and Shrek looks up to see Dragon flying overhead)
Donkey?!
speaker: Shrek

content: I guess it's just my animal magnetism.
speaker: Donkey

content: (laughs) Aw, come here, you.
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek gives Donkey a noogie)
All right, all right. Don't get all slobbery. No one likes a kiss ass. All right, hop on and hold on tight. I haven't had a chance to install the seat belts yet.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek climbs up the chain still slung around Dragon's neck. Dragon lifts Donkey up with her hand. They take off, soaring through the clouds and to Duloc)
DULOC CATHEDRAL - INTERIOR

(The church is packed with citizens. Fiona and Farquaad are standing at the altar as the priest conducts the ceremony. Thelonius stands nearby, golding a pillow on which rests the two wedding rings. Men with prompter cards hold up cards that says 'Revered Silence')
People of Duloc, we gather here today to bear witness to the union....
speaker: Bishop

content: (Fiona glances nervously at the window, noticing the sun slowly dropping toward the horizon)
Um-
speaker: Fiona

content: ...of our new king...
speaker: Bishop

content: Excuse me. Could we just skip ahead to the "I do's"?
speaker: Fiona

content: (Lord Farquaad chuckles then motions to the bishop to indulge Fiona)
Go on.
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: DULOC CATHEDRAL - EXTERIOR
(A large group of guards stand outside the cathedral on watch. Suddenly Dragon lands nearby and the guards flee in terror. Dragon looks back at Donkey after him and Shrek climb off of her back)
Go ahead, have some fun. If we need you, I'll whistle. How about that?
speaker: Donkey

content: (Dragon smiles, and nods, and takes off towards the town streets. Shrek runs for the cathedral doors but Donkey hurries to get in his way)
Shrek, wait, wait! Wait a minute! You wanna do this right, don't you?
speaker: Donkey

content: What are you talking about?
speaker: Shrek

content: There's a line, there's a line you gotta wait for. The priest is gonna say, "Speak now or forever hold your peace." And that's when you say, "I object!"
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh, I don't have time for this!
speaker: Shrek

content: Hey, wait. What are you doing? Listen to me!
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek pushes past him but Donkey pins him against the door)
Look, you love this woman, don't you?
speaker: Donkey

content: Yes.
speaker: Shrek

content: You wanna hold her?
speaker: Donkey

content: Yes.
speaker: Shrek

content: Please her?
speaker: Donkey

content: Yes!
speaker: Shrek

content: (singing) "Then you got to, got to try a little tenderness". (talking) The chicks love that romantic crap!
speaker: Donkey

content: All right! Cut it out! When does this guy say the line?
speaker: Shrek

content: We gotta check it out.
speaker: Donkey

content: INTERIOR
As the bishop talks we see Donkey through one of the windows as Shrek tosses him up so he can see.
And so, by the power vested in me...
speaker: Bishop

content: EXTERIOR
What do you see?!
speaker: Shrek

content: The whole town's in there.
speaker: Donkey

content: I now pronounce you husband and wife...
speaker: Bishop

content: They're at the altar!
speaker: Donkey

content: ...king and queen.
speaker: Bishop

content: Mother Fletcher! He already said it.
speaker: Donkey

content: Oh, for the love of Pete!
speaker: Shrek

content: (Shrek runs inside without catching Donkey, who hits the ground hard)
INTERIOR
(Fiona and Lord Farquaad are leaning in to kiss, but are interrupted when Shrek bursts through the doors. They both turn to see him running down the aisle)
I object!
speaker: Shrek

content: Shrek?
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona initially looks happily surprised to see him, but quickly becomes upset. The bishop gasps, shuts his book, and quietly slinks off)
Oh, now what does he want?
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (The whole congregation gasps as they see Shrek walk ahead towards the altar. They respond positively to him and begin to do "the wave")
Hi, everyone. Having a good time, are ya? I love Duloc, first of all. Very clean.
speaker: Shrek

content: What are you doing here?
speaker: Fiona

content: Really, it's rude enough being alive when no one wants you, but showing up uninvited to a wedding...
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Shrek initially seems taken aback by Farquaad's unnessarily harsh comment, but he quickly brushes it off and turns his attention towards Fiona)
Fiona! I need to talk to you.
speaker: Shrek

content: Oh, now you wanna talk? It's a little late for that, so if you'll excuse me--
speaker: Fiona

content: (She leans over to kiss Farquaad but Shrek pulls her away by the hand)
But you can't marry him!
speaker: Shrek

content: (She frees her hand from his grip)
And why not?
speaker: Fiona

content: Because--because he's just marrying you so he can be king!
speaker: Shrek

content: (The crowd gasps)
Outrageous! Fiona, don't listen to him--
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: He's not your true love.
speaker: Shrek

content: And what do you know about true love?!
speaker: FIONA

content: Well, I--uh--I mean...
speaker: Shrek

content: (Fiona is taken aback by this)
Oh, this is precious. (laughs) The ogre has fallen in love with the princess! Oh, good Lord. (laughs)
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Lord Farquaad gestures to the man with the prompter card holds up a card that says 'Laugh'. The whole congregation laughs)
An ogre and a princess! (laughs)
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Shrek looks back at the laughing crowd and then down at the floor, dejected)
Shrek, is this true?
speaker: Fiona

content: Who cares?! It's preposterous! Fiona, my love, we're but a kiss away from our "happily ever after." Now kiss me!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Lord Farquaad holds Fiona's hand, puckers his lips, and leans toward her. She looks down at him with disgust, and then averts her attention to the window. The sun is just about to set)
"By night one way, by day another." I wanted to show you before.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Fiona backs up and gives Shrek a sheepish smile. As the sun sets, she changes into her ogre self. The crowd gasps and one person faints. Shrek stares at Fiona in astonishment, and then grins)
Well, uh, that explains a lot!
speaker: Shrek

content: (Fiona locks eyes with Shrek and smiles)
Ugh! It's disgusting! Guards! Guards! I order you to get them out of my sight now!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (A large amount of guards run in and grab ahold of Shrek and Fiona)
Get them! Get them both!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: No, no! Shrek!
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek and Fiona try to grab each other's arms but are pulled away from each other. Lord Farquaad grabs ahold of his crown and puts it on)
This hocus-pocus alters nothing! This marriage is binding, and that makes me king! See?! See?!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: No, let go of me! Shrek!
speaker: Fiona

content: No!
speaker: Shrek

content: Don't just stand there, you morons!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: Get out of my way! Fiona!
speaker: Shrek

content: Kill him if you have to--but get him!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Shrek angrily fights back and knocks out a few of the guards, but they are able to subdue him through sheer numbers)
Beast, I'll make you regret the day we met! I'll see you drawn and quartered! You'll beg for death to save you!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: No, Shrek!
speaker: Fiona

content: And as for you, my wife!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Lord Farquaad pulls out a dagger and holds it to Fiona's throat)
Fiona!
speaker: Shrek

content: I'll have you locked back in that tower for the rest of your days! I am king!
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: (Shrek manages to pulls his arm free and he whistles loudly)
I will have order! I will have perfection! I will have--
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: Suddenly Dragon, with Donkey atop her head, crashes through a large window behind him. Lord Farquaad drops his weapon and looks up.
(Screaming)
speaker: Lord Farquaad

content: Dragon swoops down and swallows him up in one gulp. The guards either run away or step back.
All right! Nobody move! I got a dragon here, and I'm not afraid to use it.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Dragon roars, causing most of the guards to away in fear. The remaining guards let go of Shrek and Fiona, backing away)
I'm a donkey on the edge!
speaker: Donkey

content: (Dragon belches and Lord Farquaad's crown flies out of her mouth and falls to the ground)
Celebrity marriages. They never last, do they?
speaker: Donkey

content: (The congregation laughs and cheers)
Go ahead, Shrek.
speaker: Donkey

content: Uh, Fiona?
speaker: Shrek

content: Yes, Shrek?
speaker: Fiona

content: I -- I love you.
speaker: Shrek

content: Really?
speaker: Fiona

content: Really, really.
speaker: Shrek

content: I love you too.
speaker: Fiona

content: (Shrek and Fiona kiss. Thelonius takes one of the cards and writes 'Awwww' on the back and shows it to the congregation. Suddenly the magic of the spell pulls Fiona away. She's lifted up into the air and she hovers while the magic works around her. Fiona's voice is heard although she isn't moving her lips)
"Until you find true love's first kiss and then take love's true form. Take love's true form. Take love's true form."
speaker: Fiona

content: (Suddenly Fiona's eyes open wide and light up. The force of the spell blows against the crowd and all the windows. All except for one with an image of Farquaad on it, which Dragon breaks with her fist. Fiona is lowered to the ground and Shrek runs up to her)
Fiona? Fiona. Are you all right?
speaker: Shrek

content: (Fiona slowly stands up, still an ogress)
Well, yes...but I don't understand. I'm supposed to be beautiful.
speaker: Fiona

content: But you are beautiful.
speaker: Shrek

content: (They smile at each other)
I was hoping this would be a happy ending.
speaker: Donkey

content: (Shrek and Fiona)
THE SWAMP

Shrek and Fiona are now joined in matrimony in Shrek's swamp. Among the attendees are the fairytale creatures once banished to the swamp, as well as a few Duloc Guards. Shrek and Fiona walk down the aisle to their awaiting carriage, which is made of a giant onion. Fiona tosses her bouquet which both Cinderella and Snow White try to catch. They end get into a cat fight and Dragon catches the bouquet instead. Donkey looks nervous, but Shrek and Fiona give him reassuring looks. Gingy has been mended somewhat and now has one leg and walks with a candy cane cane.
